title: House of Marcus Lucretius Fronto
description: The House of M. Lucretius Fronto (V, 4, a, 11), situated off the north side of the Via di Nola, is an example of a refined domus that is small in size but with opulent Third and Fourth style wall paintings.

properties.title: OSM location of so-called "Casa di Lucrezio Frontone"
